name: Der Schweinemann: Spaceman Labs (part3)
description:
After the Events of Schweinemann 1&2, the player takes role of a Security Operator for the shady Spaceman Entity Labs Corporation.

Everything was fine. Payment was good and no incidents for a longer period of time.

But then everything changed. Some unknown Accident happened in one of the Facilities and now its your job to clean up or die trying.

Collect all 10 Documents to win the game.

Enemies are highly dangerous and will kill the player fast.

E - to pick up stuff

F - Flashlight
